fields.name: **Scenario**:
fields.value:
Training Day
*The Corrupt Cops must pay off their debts to the mafia by ransacking the houses of people they arrest or kill. You can take away their money by hanging them. Watch out, as innocent players may falsely reveal themselves as Corrupt Cops in this scenario.*

fields.name: Factional Traits:
fields.value:
- The Corrupt Cops will consist of the Narcotics Detective and a random assortment of Corrupt Cop Evils.
- The Corrupt Cops win by gaining a collective 120k$ to pay off their debt to the mafia.
- The Corrupt Cops have a factional chat.
- Whenever the Corrupt Cops roleblock a player, they gain 10k$.
- Whenever the Corrupt Cops kill a player, they gain 20k$.
- Players can see the Corrupt Cops' money each day.
- When a Corrupt Cop is lynched, any Corrupt Cop can volunteer themself to be revealed. Otherwise, the Corrupt Cops lose 30k.

-

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to take as a human shield, roleblocking them. If you would be attacked, you instead redirect the attack to the human shield.
- At night, choose a player to take Hostage. If a Corrupt Cop is lynched the next day, the Hostage will reveal themselves as a Corrupt Cop, and the Corrupt Cops lose no money.
